svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-05-13T09:01:17.211Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="XiAVhWYxbj4LkvquhX8z" version="24.4.0" type="device" pages="2"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="cQX9tYj2XLRcDKFu761q"> <mxGraphModel dx="1725" dy="955" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-1" value="CLI" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="70" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-3" value="Coordinator" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="85" width="250" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-4" value="derive(seed) -&gt; root_ca_key" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="140" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-5" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="90" y="880" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="90" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-7" value="set(manifest)" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="90" y="420" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="420" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-8" value="sign(transaction, history, ts_key) -&gt; signed_transaction" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="440" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-10" value="transaction = (set, manifest)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="400" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-14" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-11" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="680" y="500" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-15" value="persist" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-14" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1371" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="11" y="1" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-11" value="history += sigend_transaction" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="480" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-13" value="Insecure storage" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="85" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-17" value="derive(seed, history, manifest) -&gt; mesh_ca_key" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="520" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-19" value="Restart Event" style="shape=step;perimeter=stepPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontStyle=0" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="205" y="580" width="230" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-20" value="derive(seed) -&gt; root_ca_key" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="630" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-21" value="recover(seed)" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="90" y="650" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="650" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-23" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;endArrow=none;endFill=0;" parent="1" source="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-25" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="680" y="730" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-24" value="read" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-23" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.003" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-25" value="history = [ ... ]" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="710" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-26" value="for signed_transaction in history:" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="750" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-28" value="verify(signed_transaction, ts_key)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="790" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-30" value="apply(transaction)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="820" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-31" value="derive(seed, history, manifest) -&gt; mesh_ca_key" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="850" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-33" value="derive(seed) -&gt; transaction_signing_key" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="180" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="U61dIus2z_jgf4xB0YFk-34" value="derive(seed) -&gt; transaction_signing_key" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="670" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-1" value="seed" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;endFill=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="90" y="180" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="180" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-2" value="set(manifest)" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="90" y="160" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-3" value="sign(transaction, history, ts_key) -&gt; signed_transaction" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="260" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-4" value="transaction = (set, manifest)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="220" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-5" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="680" y="320" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-6" value="persist" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-5"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1371" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="11" y="1" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-7" value="history += sigend_transaction" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="300" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TbE0FtIJjH9EMNgLHIQH-8" value="derive(seed, history, manifest) -&gt; mesh_ca_key" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="340" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> <diagram id="v9SPMXlBRThaE_L2oc7R" name="Page-2"> <mxGraphModel dx="2070" dy="1146" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="XWOO_dNMsivkZvooVhwH-1" value="<div style=""><b style="background-color: initial;">Trust based on mesh CA key</b></div><div style="">The mesh CA key is deterministically derived from the seed, the history of transactions and the active manifest. After recovery, this key can be derived again given the secret seed and the history. In this scenario, the integrity of the history isn't relevant (for the data owner). The data owner still has the mesh CA cert from before the restart. Given a correct history, the key of the Coordinator will match the users cert. If history was tampered with, it won't.</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;align=left;spacingLeft=0;spacingRight=0;spacingTop=0;spacing=7;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="1020" width="350" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XWOO_dNMsivkZvooVhwH-2" value="<div style=""><b style="background-color: initial;">Trust based on root CA key and for workload owner</b></div><div style="">The transaction signing key is derived from the secret seed of the workload owner. Every transaction is signed before appended to the persistent history. Every transaction references the previous history (hash), similar to a ledger. On recovery, the transaction signing key is derived again and used to validate the transaction history.</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;align=left;spacingLeft=0;spacingRight=0;spacingTop=0;spacing=7;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="435" y="1020" width="350" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
